hero.title: Academic Success
hero.description: Join thousands of students who achieved their academic goals with our expert writing services. 24/7 support, 100% original work, and grade guarantees with full refund policy.

urgencyBanner.title: Don't let tight deadlines stress you out
urgencyBanner.subtitle: Our emergency team can deliver quality work in as little as 6 hours

services.title: Complete Academic Support
services.subtitle: From essays to dissertations, exams to online courses - we've got you covered with expert help across all subjects.

essayWriting.title: Essay & Assignment Writing
essayWriting.description: All types of academic papers: Essays, Assignments, Lab Reports, Dissertations, Thesis, and more.

examTaking.title: Exam & Test Taking
examTaking.description: Expert exam assistance with IP matching and secure ProctorU solutions for all subjects.

courseManagement.title: Online Course Management
courseManagement.description: Complete semester management for Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter courses with full attendance.

tutoring.title: 1-on-1 Tutoring
tutoring.description: Personalized tutoring for exam prep, research guidance, and concept understanding.

researchPapers.title: Research Papers
researchPapers.description: In-depth research with proper citations and formatting in APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard styles.

deadlineGuarantee.title: Deadline Guarantee
deadlineGuarantee.description: We always deliver on time. If we miss your deadline, you get a full refund - no questions asked.

premiumQuality.title: Premium Quality
premiumQuality.description: Every paper is written by subject experts with advanced degrees and years of experience.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Students Worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands who achieved academic success with our help

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Quality academic help at affordable rates with no hidden fees
pricing.priceNote: Price varies by academic level, difficulty, and deadline

about.title: Founded by Students, For Students
about.description: Triadessay was established in New York by students from Penn State, NYU, and University of Delaware. We understand the academic pressure you face because we've been there.

features.title: Expert Writers from Top Universities
features.description: Our writers are graduates from QS500 universities worldwide

features.title: Rigorous Quality Control
features.description: Every paper goes through secondary review by academic TAs

features.title: Global Coverage
features.description: Serving students in USA, UK, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Malaysia

cta.title: Ready to Boost Your Grades?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of successful students. Get expert help with your academic assignments today.

footer.description: Professional academic writing services established in New York. Your success is our mission.
